The CFIA: s website, which lists all active food recalls in Canada, shows that there has not been a recent recall for beef products of any kind, contradicting the claim.
Marsha Johnston: the CFIA's spokeswoman, confirmed that the CFIA did not issue a recall for beef products.
Recalls for beef products usually remain: s website for a few years, making it highly unlikely that a recall issued on February 3 would be deleted so quickly.
